lead_paragraph: Robert Krah, who is to be released from prison this week, was caught rooting around in the poor boxes of a church and a synagogue in Queens.
snippet: Robert Krah, who is to be released from prison this week, was caught rooting around in the poor boxes of a church and a synagogue in Queens.

headline.main: Fishing for Donations, With a Coat Hanger in Hand
headline.print_headline: Fishing for Donations, With a Hanger Doubling as a Casting Rod

abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column recounts tale of arrest of Robert Krah, homeless man in Queens, for petty larceny after he was observed on security camera recordings repeatedly stealing money from a synagogue's poor box using a coat hanger; Krah had been arrested for same crime, using same tool, at a nearby church in 2014.
